im:name.label: Gran Saga：格蘭騎士團（港澳新馬）

summary.label:
《Gran Saga：格蘭騎士團》是一款使用UE4引擎所打造的跨世代3A日韓大作，遊戲採用機械文明與奇幻世界觀混合的背景，描述騎士團為了解除巨龍施加在王國的詛咒，而踏上冒險旅程的故事，遊戲中玩家可收集各種屬性的多元角色，自由操控三人小隊享受RPG的戰鬥及培育角色之樂趣，而遊戲中超過千種的「格蘭武器」及「神器」還可隨著關卡搭配提供更多玩法上的變化，帶給玩家前所未有的跨時代3A Lite多元冒險風格！

========遊戲特色========

●UE4引擎製作震撼感官盛宴●
●日本豪華聲優陣容，天野喜孝、下村陽子監製●
UE4 引擎打造的3A級遊戲世界觀、精緻的 3D 動態模組呈現，最終幻想製作人「天野喜孝」特別監製，以及世界知名作曲家「下村陽子」製作的遊戲 BGM，帶給你前所未有的立體視覺及聽覺饗宴。

●沉浸體驗揭開失憶少女的秘密●
●三百萬字遊戲劇情、一千小時遊戲配音●
超過300萬字的遊戲劇情、高達1000小時配音時長，透過豐富的主線動畫及支線故事，與神祕少女踏上冒險旅程逐步解開埋藏記憶深處的秘密。

●收集化身為武器的可愛少女●
●使用格蘭武器技能變身超越極限●
寄宿著傳說靈魂的「格蘭武器」讓玩家們收集培育，還可變身為各式各樣可愛的少女及傳說英雄並施展出獨特的招式及變身技能。

●千種格蘭武器及神器任你收集搭配●
●與騎士團角色培養信賴度，互動養成超樂趣●
超過百種的格蘭武器及神器，根據關卡搭配出不同的陣容，開創獨特的戰鬥風格；騎士團的各個角色擁有著不同能力及背景故事，藉由戰鬥及對話，深入了解他們的故事，培養彼此之間的信賴度。

●3A Lite電腦手機跨平台互通●
●多福利的跨時代鉅作，隨時隨地可以玩●
電腦手機平台跨裝置遊玩，無論身處何處都能體驗來自跨世代3A Lite大作的臨場感，遊玩殿堂級大作更輕鬆無設限。

●多角色自由切換操控探索更多驚奇●
●PVP競技、巨大BOSS組隊試煉等多元特色副本●
獨創多角色操控自由切換玩法，在廣闊的土地上自由探索，並與好友一同合作挑戰來自「降臨戰、殲滅戰、精靈王」等各種巨大BOSS的競技試煉副本。

●細膩微操作搭配屬性策略戰術取勝●
●髮型時裝坐騎自由搭配，客制化隨心所欲●
配合不同關卡的屬性將各角色輪番上陣，利用走位技巧及裝備搭配策略贏得勝利；還有髮型髮色、時裝任意變換，讓你打造與眾不同獨一無二的個人風格，創造出屬於你自己的騎士角色！

========關注我們========
立即加入FB粉絲團，搶先獲得最新消息，以及限時活動好禮！
※官方粉絲團：https://www.facebook.com/GranSaga.RPG.TW
※官方網站：https://gransaga.qookkagames.com
※聯繫客服：gransaga@qookkagames.com

※支持跨平台體驗遊戲，建議預留10G以上容量。
※本遊戲內容涉及暴力、戀愛交友，依軟體分級管理辦法分類為輔15級。
※本遊戲為免費使用，但遊戲內部份內容或服務需另行支付其他費用。
※請注意遊戲時間，避免沉迷遊戲，可能影響身心健康。

summary.label:
神級像素IP續作，RPG手遊《歧路旅人：大陸的霸者》正式上線！

由8位主人公在奧魯斯特拉大陸上展開的全新故事，您可以在遊戲中以自己的方式穿越像素藝術和3DCG交織的奇幻世界。
出發吧，踏上屬於自己的旅途！


【Square Enix正版授權，日本殿堂級像素策略遊戲最新作】
作為《歧路旅人》系列手遊最新作，講述了一個發生在奧魯斯特拉大陸的全新故事。
玩家將在細膩的三維像素畫風場景(HD-2D)和沉穩莊重的背景配樂所共同營造出的充滿沉浸感的幻想世界中冒險和曆練，經歷許許多多或沉重或溫馨或歡樂的劇情故事。

【遊戲世界觀】
奧魯斯特拉大陸上存在著蘊含眾神力量的神之戒指。其中三枚戒指流落到了三個邪惡之人手中，這三個邪惡之人利用戒指分別實現了自己在“財富”、“權力”、“名聲”上的慾望並成為了霸者統治著這片大陸。他們的慾望像無底深淵一般沒有止境，讓原本祥和的大陸陷入了混沌之中。

【遊戲特色】
◆由像素編制的幻想世界◆
畫面延續了前作的像素HD-2D幻想風，通過將3DCG的視覺效果添加到像素藝術之中，展現最夢幻的遊戲世界。

◆三支主線，沉浸體驗◆
主角作為被神之戒指選定之人，在奧魯斯特拉大陸的舞台，擔負著對抗邪惡之人，使大陸重回平靜的使命。
“財富”，“權力”，“名聲”，你將從哪個故事開始自己的旅程？

◆八大職業，策略戰鬥，特色地圖指令玩法◆
遊戲中包含8大職業：劍士、舞者、商人、學者、藥師、盜賊、獵人、神官。
每種職業都擁有各自特有的屬性和特征，玩家可以根據個人喜好選擇不同職業的角色。
戰鬥中，玩家可以選擇最大8人組隊進行指令攻擊。
小鎮裡，可以向NPC情報詢問、購買物品、僱傭等

◆頂級配樂，品質享受 ◆
來自現場表演錄製的遊戲音樂。繼《歧路旅人》之後，由西木康智製作的音樂，還有許多全新曲目收錄其中。

※為了讓您獲得更好的遊戲體驗，設備推薦滿足以下條件：
iOS設備：運行內存2G以上，剩餘儲存空間2G以上，iPhone 6S 或更高版本，Ipad第5代或更高版本，系統版本在iOS 12.0及以上。


~~注意事項~~
※本遊戲依照遊戲軟體分級管理辦法分類為 : 輔12級。
※本遊戲涉及性、暴力、人物打鬥等非血腥畫面、遊戲角色穿著凸顯性特徵之服飾但不涉及性暗示。
※請避免沉迷遊戲。
※本遊戲部份內容需額外支付費用。
※未成年或無行為能力人，需由法定代理人同意後方可使用本遊戲服務。

summary.label:
Apex 英雄M植根於不斷演變、壯大的Apex 英雄™宇宙，由Electronic Arts授權，Level Infinite發行，光子和Respawn工作室聯合開發，是一款結合了英雄玩法、小隊競技、快節奏戰鬥的戰略射擊大逃殺手遊。

在這裏，來自邊境各處的英雄集結，為爭奪金錢、名聲和榮耀而戰。玩家可以三人組隊，與其它小隊對抗。靈活運用英雄技能，協同作戰，從而主宰戰鬥。

 在Apex 英雄M中你將體驗到：

- 完美還原，經典地圖再現
還原Apex英雄™經典地圖，你所熟悉的邊境風貌將被一一呈現。在此基礎之上，還會有全新內容不斷上線，持續拓展遊戲玩法的多元性，讓每個賽季都有新鮮體驗。
 
- 戰術配合，暢爽遊戲體驗
在Apex 英雄M中，策略至關重要。製定戰術，發揮出每位英雄的優勢，並結合身法走位、槍法技巧、武器選擇等，這些將是最終獲勝的關鍵！
 
- 手遊獨享，全新英雄登場
手遊獨家英雄將逐一亮相！不同的遭遇引領他們紛紛加入Apex競賽，但是成為冠軍是不變的共同目標。相信他們能夠幫助你在Apex 英雄M中獲得更多勝利！

- 個性英雄，玩轉專屬技能
經典英雄「尋血犬」，「直布羅陀」，「生命線」，「探路者」，「惡靈」，「邦加羅爾」，「腐蝕」，「幻象」，「辛烷」，以及手遊全新英雄「昲影」「狂響」等待與你並肩作戰。掌握每個角色的專屬技能，瞭解他們獨特的能力個性和背景故事，探索自己心儀的玩法風格。

- 三人組隊，贏得最終勝利
三人組隊，和誌同道合的朋友一起加入大逃殺，開啟緊張刺激的競技角逐。利用專屬技能，與隊友相互配合，從而主宰戰場，成為冠軍小隊。

- 終結特效，一招製勝敵人
令玩家津津樂道的遊戲特色，在手遊中得到了充分的還原和升級。使出酷炫的終結技，用英雄專屬的獨特方式，一招製勝，獲取勝利！

英雄集結，捍衛巔峰！即刻下載Apex 英雄M，隨時隨地，問鼎冠軍！

Celebrating 10 years of the SAO anime, the new mobile game Sword Art Online Variant Showdown is finally here!

When Kirito and his friends hear about a new game called Cross Edge that is supposedly causing memory loss to its players, they set off to investigate...
But while playing Cross Edge, they are ambushed by a mysterious presence!

Take control of characters straight out of the anime like Kirito and Asuna in ferocious 3D battles!
Do you have what it takes to defeat fearsome bosses like The Gleam Eyes?

Sword Art Online Variant Showdown Features:

UNIQUE SAO BATTLE SYSTEM
Use character-specific Sword Skills and switch between offense and defense on the fly to take down vicious bosses!
Counter enemies' special attacks with parries! Awaken your characters to unleash their true power on the battlefield!

AN ALL NEW ORIGINAL STORYLINE
Featuring the world of Cross Edge, a VR action game developed by a middle school genius, experience a brand new story with Kirito and his friends.
And just who is this new, original character Layla?

BUILD YOUR DREAM PARTY
Choose 3 characters you know and love from SAO and take control of them in battle.
Each character has his or her own special techniques and Skills, so be sure to form parties that exploit your opponents' weaknesses!

POWER-UP YOUR CHARACTERS
Equip your characters with Ability Cards to raise their power!
Boost your strengths or mitigate your weaknesses! Strategically equip cards to create the ultimate party!

CUSTOMIZABLE CHARACTERS WITH TONS OF VARIATION

You can also add specific characters to your party to get special interactions that can only be seen in SAOVS!

Tap Away 3D is brought to you by Popcore, makers of hit puzzle games with more than 250 million combined installs!

Tap Away 3D is a fun and addictive 3D puzzle game, but it’s more than just that - it’s a brain teaser that will take you to the next level!

Tap the blocks to make them fly away and clear the screen. But the blocks will only fly in one direction, so you’ve got to approach this brain teaser carefully! Slide your finger around the screen to rotate the shape and attack the blocks from every angle!  As you progress, the blocks form bigger and bigger shapes, and the blocks themselves change form, so you’ll need to get your thinking hat on to solve the puzzles in this 3D puzzle game. And that’s not it! There are skins and themes you can unlock as you get further, as well as challenges to keep you on your toes. In this fun and colorful game, you challenge your logic, critical thinking, and precision. Do you have what it takes?

WITH TAP AWAY 3D YOU CAN
▶ PLAY the full 3D puzzle game experience offline and on the go.
▶ SWIPE to rotate the shape and choose your next move.
▶ TAP the blocks to clear the level.
▶ CUSTOMIZE your blocks with different skins and themes.
▶ REACH the top!

▶ RELIEVE your stress.

▶ ENJOY cool skins and themes to customize your journey!

summary.label:
“太好了，我們終於不用流浪了嗚嗚嗚。”
這是一群在外流浪多年的動物們發自內心的喜悅。
在這裡，你將帶領他們來到一座未開發的島嶼，通過開荒擴土、探索採集、交易經營、拓海跑商，獲取豐富的物資資源，創造出一個充滿自由和童話的夢幻世界。讓動物們不再顛沛流離，從此過上安定自足的生活！

【開闊地圖，裝扮世界】
白雪盡情地揮灑於萬物，無盡的寒意使天地界限逐漸模糊。
澄澈水面映照著櫻花樹，偶然飄落粉色花瓣泛起層層漣漪。
城市擁有建築，工廠，裝飾物等3000餘個。土地和雪地；平面和高層；白天和夜晚；一起都會呈現出不同的唯美意境！
哐當！看我挖到了什麼？世界地圖裡竟然有寶藏，一起來尋寶呀。

【動物養成，圖鑒收集】
城市建設需要招募更多動物，動物專屬特長為工廠生產、拓荒、建築搭建、釣魚等活動線上自己的一份力。但是想讓他們工作的話，必須要住上動物公寓哦。
長頸鹿喜歡和伴侶看日落，所以他在家裡開了兩個天窗探頭欣賞。
企鵝家裡不買電視和冰箱，因為她就是電視，她伴侶就是冰箱。
樹懶是著名的路癡，總找不到回家的路……
獨具個性的動物們在城市裡穿梭遊走，歡迎來撩！

【經營系統，放置玩法】
工廠樹會長出很多美食！有香甜美味的南瓜派、醇香濃郁的咖啡、柔軟酸甜的草莓聖代……把這些食物拿去訂單交易，能獲得大量的金幣和建築材料哦。
另外，眾多訂單裡面有一份特殊的訂單，是熊貓墩墩周遊世界的時候順便帶去交易的。有空可以翻看墩墩的旅行日記，特別有意思。     遊戲的養成系統簡單易上手，升級和解鎖都由玩家自己選擇，等級樹只要放置動物居民研究即可完成升級解鎖。如果想經營好城市，那做好時間管理，合理安排好動物工作！


【共同建設，家園合併】
遊戲設定中有共同建設的玩法。
玩家能委託好友裝飾自己的城市，解鎖家族後能邀請家族成員合併家園島，自由建設共同展現家族的魅力。家族中每個族員都可以通過挖礦、跑商、釣魚、遠征獲得家族貢獻獲得豐富的裝飾資源。


【個性裝飾，自由度高】
玩家角色形象、城市、家園庭院和室內，你都可以進行diy。無論是一條馬路、一張椅子、乃至一棵草，都需要你來搭建。遊戲內室內外裝飾主題應有盡有，室外的瑰麗海洋、夏日海灘、浪漫婚禮……室內的森林風、少女風等等，一鍵解決不會裝飾的煩惱！

最後，跟隨你內心的靈感，按照你的想法，大膽建造屬於你的城市吧！

Step into Teyvat, a vast world teeming with life and flowing with elemental energy.

You and your sibling arrived here from another world. Separated by an unknown god, stripped of your powers, and cast into a deep slumber, you now awake to a world very different from when you first arrived.

Thus begins your journey across Teyvat to seek answers from The Seven — the gods of each element. Along the way, prepare to explore every inch of this wondrous world, join forces with a diverse range of characters, and unravel the countless mysteries that Teyvat holds...

MASSIVE OPEN WORLD

Climb any mountain, swim across any river, and glide over the world below, taking in the jaw-dropping scenery each step of the way. And if you stop to investigate a wandering Seelie or strange mechanism, who knows what you might discover?

ELEMENTAL COMBAT SYSTEM

Harness the seven elements to unleash elemental reactions. Anemo, Electro, Hydro, Pyro, Cryo, Dendro, and Geo interact in all sorts of ways, and Vision wielders have the power to turn this to their advantage.

Will you vaporize Hydro with Pyro, electro-charge it with Electro, or freeze it with Cryo? Your mastery of the elements will give you the upper hand in battle and exploration.

BEAUTIFUL VISUALS

Feast your eyes on the world around you, with a stunning art style, real-time rendering, and finely tuned character animations delivering you a truly immersive visual experience. Lighting and weather all change naturally over time, bringing every detail of this world to life.

SOOTHING SOUNDTRACK

Let the beautiful sounds of Teyvat draw you in as you explore the expansive world around you. Performed by the world's top orchestras such as London Philharmonic Orchestra and Shanghai Symphony Orchestra, the soundtrack changes seamlessly with the time and gameplay to match the mood.

BUILD YOUR DREAM TEAM

Team up with a diverse cast of characters in Teyvat, each with their own unique personalities, stories, and abilities. Discover your favorite party combinations and level up your characters to help you conquer even the most daunting of enemies and domains.

JOURNEY WITH FRIENDS

Team up with friends across various platforms to trigger more elemental action, tackle tricky boss fights, and conquer challenging domains together to reap rich rewards.

As you stand atop the peaks of Jueyun Karst and take in the rolling clouds and vast terrain stretching out before you, you may wish to stay in Teyvat a little longer... But until you are reunited with your lost sibling, how can you rest? Go forth, Traveler, and begin your adventure!

“All roads lead to our ‘Goodbye.’” 

Boasting an epic soundtrack that can turn the world of gaming on its head, and some of the most stunning designs ever seen in a game, Bank of Innovation’s newest title, MementoMori, is finally here! 

Songs performed by many renowned artists enhance the rich world of MementoMori. 
*We recommend playing while wearing earphones or headphones. 

◆ STORY: 
A tale of “justice” woven by girls whose fragile hearts verge on shattering... 

There are girls who many call “witches.” 
Although they themselves are ordinary, they can wield slightly extraordinary powers. 
However, when calamity spreads throughout the land, witches begin to be feared and detested. 
Before long, the Church of Longinus commenced what would be known as “The Witch Hunt.” 

“Witches are to blame for this calamity. If we kill them, then the calamity will vanish along with them!” 

Witches are executed one by one. 
But one day, as madness seizes control of the world, it is suddenly overrun by “Curses.” 
A country incinerated by hellfire. A kingdom consumed by crystals. An empire purged by the Tree of Life. 
Such are the woeful desires of those who are called “Witches of Qlipha.” 
Without any means to defend themselves, nation after nation falls into ruin, until finally— 
The fractured land is sent adrift high into the sky. 

Meanwhile, the people have yet to take notice. 
From within these girls cursed to be witches, there emanates glimmers of hope. 
In order to save their decimated world, these girls set forth liberating the land from darkness. 
For they believe that it is the right thing to do... 

◆ GAME: 
・Play utilizing both easy-to-use full auto battles and high-level strategy! 
・Behold stunning action-packed battles animated using Live2D! 
・Harness the “Idle System” to gradually get stronger as the girls fight even while you’re away! 
・Unlock tons of content as you advance the story! 
・Discover infinite strategic possibilities by combining your wit with the girls’ magical powers! 
・Enhance gear to precisely influence how the girls grow stronger! 
・Communicate with your friends as you form the most powerful guild in the land! 

◆ SOUND: 
The girls of MementoMori are burdened with cruel pasts and inevitable fates. 
・Cry to “Laments,” which sing each girl’s emotions to life.

The diversity of high-quality musical compositions heavily intertwines with the perilous world of MementoMori, providing a new and exciting gaming experience.

Blockudoku® is an original combination of sudoku and block puzzle games. It’s a simple yet challenging puzzle you won’t be able to put down.

Match blocks to complete lines and squares to remove them. Keep the board clean, and beat your high score.

How to play:

- Drop the blocks on the 9x9 grid.
- Fill up lines and squares to keep the board clean.
- Complete Daily Challenges and get unique trophies.
- Join Seasonal Events and get unique animated postcards.
- Compete against other players in Tournaments, beat your high score, and climb the leaderboard.
- Destroy several elements at once to make a Combo.
- Make several successful moves in a row to get a Streak.
- Customize the game with a theme of your choice.

How to become a Blockudoku® master?

• There is no time limit, so no need to rush. Think one step ahead when faced with a difficult move. It might be your last one.
• Try to place classic and wood blocks on the board to destroy lines or 3x3 squares with every move to keep the board from filling up.
• Find your zen by balancing between destroying figures as quickly as possible and getting as many combos and streaks as you can to score higher.
• Score more points by making streaks. The emptier the board, the better for you!
• It's always risky to wait for a good block – you may quickly run out of moves. When you see a chance to destroy a figure, do it.

Relieve stress, or train your brain with a relaxing, yet challenging, game of Blockudoku® anywhere, anytime!

Sheep N Sheep is one of the newest tile matching games. Most tile games are suitable for casual entertaining, but also help to relax after stressful studying and working hours. The rules are simple and easy to pick up. All you need is to match 3 tiles with the same vivid picture, for instance, 3 bells or 3 grass. Clear the board from all the tiles to go to the next level.

Matching games can be tricky, but normally they have some common tile connect mechanics. After all, you still need to connect the tiles with pictures, right? Most free tile games have quite similar rules. And here’s ours.

HOW TO PLAY OUR TILES GAME
Well, you should match 3 tiles with the same image. Just tap to put them into the stack. Three same tiles will be matched and removed from the stack.
When you clear the board, you win. Keep practicing to become a real tile master one day.
You fail, if you don't get at least one merge for seven tiles in your stack. Remember: you have a maximum of seven moves to make one combination of three tiles. Each tile link move matters.

Sheep N Sheep FEATURES
► Match Tiles - Challenge your brain through thousands of mahjong puzzles. Puzzles start with low difficulty and become challenging fast!
► Super difficult puzzle - only 0.1% of players can solve the puzzle. Are you one of them? Come and challenge yourself!
► One new stage a day - a brand new stage will be published every day, challenge with global users, and compete with the speed of clearance!
► Compete with global users - the leaderboard will display the number of players who pass the level in each region, try to pass the level to occupy the top of the leaderboard!
► Create a Calm Experience - Solve addictive yet always evolving tile matching mahjong puzzles in a unique and calm experience.
► Relax and Have Fun - Take your time to solve the puzzles and clear the board. They are simply for your entertainment and will relax your brain.

Enjoy this tile-matching mahjong game, have a moment of peace throughout your day to calm your mind and boost your brain. Sharpen your mind with a series of tile matching levels that gradually increase puzzle difficulty.

Come back to it every day, as there is always a new daily tile matching mahjong puzzle!

Increase mindfulness, exercise your brain, and take control of your daily life through puzzle games. Start matching sheep tiles!
